Title: Oliver!
Cast: Ron Moody, Shani Wallis, Oliver Reed, Harry Secombe, Mark Lester, Jack Wild, Hugh Griffith, Joseph O'Conor, Peggy Mount, Leonard Rossiter, Hylda Baker, Kenneth Cranham, Megs Jenkins, Sheila White, Wensley Pithey
Plot: Musical adaptation about an orphan who runs away from an orphanage and hooks up with a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor. Musical adaptation of Charles Dickens's classic tale of an orphan who runs away from the orphanage and hooks up with a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor. Written by Murray Chapman <muzzle@cs.uq.oz.au>
Location: Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, Surrey, England, UK
Actors: Mark Lester, Ron Moody, Shani Wallis
Writer: Lionel Bart (book), Vernon Harris (screenplay) | 1 more credit »
Description: Directed by Carol Reed.  With Mark Lester, Ron Moody, Shani Wallis, Oliver Reed. Musical adaptation about an orphan who runs away from an orphanage and hooks up with a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.
